title: Lesson 41
paragraph: This lesson addresses stability and order, highlighting consistency, coherence, and structure.

words.meaning: a state of balance or stability
words.example: The ecosystem maintained a delicate equilibrium.

words.meaning: the quality of being made up of exactly similar parts
words.example: The symmetry of the building pleased the architect.

words.meaning: conformity in the application of something
words.example: Consistency in training yields better results.

words.meaning: the quality of being unchanging or dependable
words.example: Her constancy in friendship was admired.

words.meaning: a rule or directive made to control conduct
words.example: The company complied with safety regulations.

words.meaning: the quality of being the same or consistent
words.example: Uniformity in design creates a professional look.

words.meaning: the quality of being logical and consistent
words.example: The essay lacked coherence in its argument.

words.meaning: the continued existence or endurance of something
words.example: The persistence of tradition shaped the culture.

words.meaning: the quality of being uniform in composition
